alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake Valley; Bear River Range; Blackfoot Mountains; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Marsh and Arbon Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 8:13PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Line of thunderstorms from Preston to Swan Lake moving east into the Bear River Range and Bear Lake through 915 PM MDT... At 809 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of thunderstorms extending from near Swanlake to 8 miles northwest of Preston to Franklin, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 35 mph, occasional lightning, and moderate to heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Preston, Swanlake, Bear Lake Idaho Portion, Franklin, Saint Charles, Oneida Narrows Reservoir, Clifton, Oxford, Minnetonka Cave, Mapleton, Fish Haven, Mink Creek, Whitney and Riverdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake Valley; Bear River Range; Blackfoot Mountains; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Marsh and Arbon Highlands
